name: pig slayer
author: 灰噗_Lp4hbt
content: Ye Chuan — a mental patient — sees all living creatures as pigs. On the day of his job assignment, he awakened a life-class profession: Butcher. His teachers and classmates were bitterly disappointed, and even his childhood sweetheart left him. However, this seemingly useless profession granted him two unique traits: • He deals extra damage to pigs. • Damage from pigs is halved. And since everyone looks like pigs in his eyes, armed with just a butcher’s knife, Ye Chuan begins his incredible rise
